Text:
I have not included any requests in this flood as I have not had the time to go over comments/requests.

I will include requests in my next flood,meanwhile I'm sure you'll find something you might like in this one :)

Thanks BigBlueSea, just wanted to say that me and the wife really appriciate your efforts!

Also I do have a request for you:
Raising Good Children, Lickona

or any of Jo Frost's books:
Jo Frost's confident toddler care
Jo Frost's confiden baby care
Supernanny: How to get the best from your children

Were having our first in December :)

Thanks again!!
Your book floods are fantastic, Thank you

Thank you so much for your book floods , we always find great reads! Muchly appreciated! Where do we make a request if there is a book  we would like? I have searched everywhere for Sarah Jio's The Bungalow and Mary Alice Munroe's Swimming Lessons & Breach House Memories. Merci!
Thank you for the von Kleist and E. Taylor.

BBS, I'm searching for 
Gold Rush: How Mr Prospector Became Racing's Billion Dollar Sire
978-1-58150-173-5

The Kingmaker: How Northern Dancer Founded a Racing Dynasty   by Avalyn Hunter
Eclipse Press 

Eclipse : The Horse That Changed Racing History 

and 
Equine E R
by Leslie Guttman 
ISBN # : 978-1-58150-213-8

I always look for your floods and always seed for quite a while. I'm housebound. I have seizures which are not always controlled by medication. I really appreciate your work in finding books for us to read. Thank you so much!
Thanks bigbluesea! Appreciate all your wonderful uploads, I hope that you are finding the books that YOU like to read! :)

Serena by Ron Rash
Silver linings playbook by Matthew Quick

xD

Serena By Ron Rash
Silver Linings Playbook by Matthew Quick
Pls I will really appreciate it if you could help get this book "Epiphany" by "Elise Ballard". Thanks.
Thanks. I always look through these and a well-known author I've never read catches my eye. Great uploads BBS.

Great work. I love all the submissions. 

You mentioned a bit ago you'd have some Robert Silverberg books coming up? I can't find those? Did you include them? If not, can I request some?

Thanks.
Thanx BBS...You are a star....looking for Kathy Riechs and Karen Kingsbury books if you can...thanx again.
Thanx a lot...looking for Kathy Riechs and Karen Kingsbury books....Thanx again.
Thank you so very much.   This is a fabulous series

@BBS

Thank you very much for a great u/l again.

@bigbluesea

Thank you for the uploads again.
thank you ive a couple of requests john connollys the wrath of angels and the new peter robinson book watching the dark again many thanks

@quadrecip

@BBS

A silly question: how do you remember and handle all these requests??? :)
You are wonderful.  A lot of books that I have been looking for.

@pir8s007 

I just put the name of the book or Aurthur in my server search engine and if I have that book I download it to a request folder,after I have all the requests I upload it into a Book Flood

Thanks BBS! I'm looking for The Humans Who Went Extinct: Why Neanderthals Died Out and We Survived by Clive Finlayson. ISBN-10: 0199239193 | ISBN-13: 978-0199239191
Will you be able to upload this?
Thanks in advance!

thank you for being gracious enough to share:)

Looking for the following Penguin Classics books...The Canterbury Tales: A Retelling by Peter Ackroyd, The Penguin Book of Renaissance Verse: 1509-1659, Utopia by Thomas More. Also, still interested in Mercury: An Intimate Biography of Freddie Mercury by Lesley-Ann Jones.
BBS, Youre the best... Thank You!!!!  :)

@cuegeee

I need Titles as my books are not  categorized by genre.If you can give me titles I can check to see if I have it :)

BigBlueSea thank you a great deal! I have downloaded all of them, but 1 question arose: when I upload it on my PocketBook device, it says that files are damaged/protected. It opens other epubs. And yours are not damaged, I can open them on my PC. I guess they are locked? how can I unlock them. thanks
Thanks again BBS for including Marilee Ferrell books. Wife loves christian romance novels and you are only one i can find putting them on. TY!

can you post this Ian hamilton book called red pole of macau?

Can you please upload the book Diana: Her True Story by Andrew Morton
